title: Pending Concurrent Requests / Beklemede Olan Eşzamanlı İstekler
description: Lists pending, inactive, and queued concurrent requests

queries.sql: SELECT fcr.request_id, fcr.program_application_id, fcr.concurrent_program_id, fcr.phase_code, fcr.status_code, fcr.requested_by_user_id, fcr.request_date, fcr.actual_start_date, fcp.user_concurrent_program_name FROM fnd_concurrent_requests fcr JOIN fnd_concurrent_programs fcp ON fcr.concurrent_program_id = fcp.concurrent_program_id WHERE fcr.status_code IN ('P', 'I', 'Q') AND ROWNUM <= 50 ORDER BY fcr.request_date

doc_hint: Lists pending (P), inactive (I), and queued (Q) concurrent requests. Shows age of request and requested user. Long waits indicate manager issues.
analysis_prompt: Analyze pending requests. Report: (1) how many requests waiting, (2) oldest pending request age, (3) which programs are queued most, (4) recommend restarting managers if requests are stuck.
